Title: TYPO3 Information Disclosure Vulnerability Exploitable by Editors
Description: It has been discovered, that editors with access to the file list module could list all files names and folder names in the root directory of a TYPO3 installation. Modification of files, listing further nested directories or retrieving file contents was not possible. A valid backend user account is needed to exploit this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.14, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.14 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.3.1
